body_html:
@Mazecreator
I also followed all the instructions from (http://textminingonline.com/dive-into-tensorflow-part-iii-gtx-1080-ubuntu16-04-cuda8-0-cudnn5-0-tensorflow) which I assumed very similar to what you explained. There should be some compile errors and let me try again and update the error if it doesn't work. Good to heard that there are some people actually did the installation. Thanks for your help anyway!
